# Charred

Very simple package with `is_same_char` and `repeat_char` methods.

I possibly will add more later.

Install package:

```
pip install charred

# or pip3
```

Usage:

```
from charred import is_same_char, repeat_char

is_same_char('FF') # True
is_same_char('FD') # False

repeat_char('F', 6) # FFFFFF
```
